data.title: AI-Assisted Coding Killed My Joy of Programming | Meysam
data.description: AI coding assistants feel like video game cheat codes—exciting at first, then soul-crushing. A raw reflection on losing the joy of programming in 2025 and why I keep going back to my piano.
data.author: Meysam Azad
data.keywords: indie hacker, solopreneur, SaaS, bootstrapped startup, DevOps, SRE, technical founder, customer discovery, product validation, building in public
